properties.config.enrichmentSQL: SELECT ACCOUNTTYPE, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, AGE, GENDER, STREETADDRESS, CITY, STATE, ZIPCODE, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM CUSTOMERACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNTNUMBER = '${accountnumber}'
properties.config.enrichedOutputFields: accounttype, firstname, lastname, age, gender, street, city, state, zipcode, homelatitude, homelongitude
properties.name: ENRICH-PHOENIX

properties.config.enrichmentSQL: SELECT LATITUDE, LONGITUDE FROM TRANSACTIONHISTORY WHERE TRANSACTIONTIMESTAMP = ( SELECT MAX(TRANSACTIONTIMESTAMP) FROM TRANSACTIONHISTORY WHERE ACCOUNTNUMBER = '${accountnumber}' AND FRAUDULENT = 'false')
properties.name: ENRICH-PHOENIX

properties.config.enrichmentSQL: SELECT MEAN, DEV FROM CUSTOMERPROFILE WHERE ACCOUNTNUMBER = '${accountnumber}' AND FEATURETYPE = 'distance'
properties.name: ENRICH-PHOENIX

properties.config.enrichmentSQL: SELECT MEAN, DEV FROM CUSTOMERPROFILE WHERE ACCOUNTNUMBER = '${accountnumber}' AND FEATURETYPE = '${merchanttype}'
properties.name: ENRICH-PHOENIX

rules.name: projection_auto_generated
rules.sql: SELECT STRING_TO_DOUBLE(latitude) AS "lastlatitude",STRING_TO_DOUBLE(longitude) AS "lastlongitude",STRING_TO_DOUBLE(latitude) AS "currentlatitude",STRING_TO_DOUBLE(longitude) AS "currentlongitude",accountnumber,transactionid,latitude,longitude,homelatitude,homelongitude FROM custom_processor_stream_2

rules.name: Yellow
rules.description: Transaction has small likelihood of fraud
rules.sql: SELECT *  FROM projection_transform_stream_26 WHERE score >= 50 AND score < 65

rules.name: Amber
rules.sql: SELECT *  FROM projection_transform_stream_26 WHERE score >= 65 AND score < 75
